========================
Changes between versions
========================

0.2 (2008-11-11)
================

Features:
  - Added functions to control a pager for displaying a longer piece of text
    to the user.
  - Added a factory for readline completer functions on file names from the
    file system.

Bug fixes:
  - In the static completer function, stopped readline from offering the
    partial text itself as a completion again and again if it is the only
    possible completion.

Organisation:
  - set zip_safe flag to False
  - added more tests


0.1 (2008-04-07)
================

initial release
